name: AFTERSHOCK
detailed_description:
PC PowerPlay

"A Game To Look Out For"


About the Game

AFTERSHOCK

is a multiplayer open world first/third-person survival game developed by Focus Studios and will be published on Steam during 2018.

The Game takes place is Esseker, Bosnia in the year 2022. An unknown organization built large radio towers which fried anyone's brain in a nearby radius. These people became aggressive and would kill anything in their way. There were rumors of Esseker being a safe place, but the rumors were false, as you would soon find out.

  • Survive with up to 64 other players!
  • Fully Dynamic Weather System.
  • Gather Resources to Survive.
  • Explore the large rich map 'Esseker' (169^2KM).
  • Build bases with your friends.
  • Place traps.
  • New take on the vehicle system (read more below).

  • Being in range of a tower can have various effects on your character.
  • Being in the radius of a tower without the proper head gear can fry your brain turning you into a CRAZY.
  • Towers can be manually turned on and off from the tower itself.
  • Towers can be disabled in server settings and spawn randomly on map load.


  • Build a base to keep the CRAZIES out and other players.
  • Different resources build different parts.
  • Place traps to fend off enemies.
  • Turn your vehicle into a moving base.


  • Explore the large world of Esseker with Vehicles, because walking isnt that efficient.
  • Walk around in moving vehicles like a Bus or an RV.
  • Fortify your larger vehicles with Traps and Fortifications.


  • Full Dynamic AI affected by the Day/Night cycle + Weather.
  • Hand Crafted AI which are a real threat.
  • Hordes of CRAZIES which can be redirected towards an enemy base.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 32 bit version
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version
  • Processor: Intel Kaby Lake Core i5 7400 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 4 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
